abstract: JPMorgan Chase’s co-head of private equity investment banking, George Foussianes, has been shifted to lead the firm’s consumer and retail banking group, TheStreet.com reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase’s co-head of private equity investment banking, George Foussianes, has been shifted to lead the firm’s consumer and retail banking group, TheStreet.com reported.
lead_paragraph: With buyout deals relatively rare these days, JPMorgan Chase has moved one of the heads of its financial sponsors investment banking group, which works with private equity firms, to a new position.
